summary.body: don't know if it's a practical joke or a sign of an attempted break-in, but I found a heavy iron rod on my balcony (in andrewes) and a bamboo rod stuck in one of the flower pots. Also one of the balcony partitions from the next flat was not properly shut. Maybe someone looking for windows open due to the heat?
summary.subject: prowlers

summary.body: Been away for a couple of weeks but heard 3rd hand that there had been a "spate" of break ins on the estate,    is this true??
summary.subject: Bulglaries?

summary.body: I wonder if our local police office can cast any light on the rumour on the main discussion pages?
summary.subject: Barbican burglaries?
